mapper.select: select count(*) from guide_group_infos as ggi left join admin as a on ggi.guide_id = a.admin_id left join guide_agency_infos as gai on ggi.guide_group_agency_id = gai.guide_agency_id -- left join coupon_scheme as cs on ggi.guide_group_coupon_id = cs.plan_id

SELECT * FROM guide_group_infos as ggi left join guide_agency_infos as gai on ggi.guide_group_agency_id = gai.guide_agency_id left join admin as a on ggi.guide_id = a.admin_id left join coupon_scheme as cs on ggi.guide_group_coupon_id = cs.plan_id WHERE ggi.guide_group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
